text: Saw a worrisome video trending where a Texas based Female Dr advocates for #chloroquine in #COVID19 patients. Fine, ongoing studies on that.However,she alarmingly discards use of masks.This is careless & irresponsible.Pls wear a mask and #StaySafe #BlackAndWhiteChallenge @NCDCgov https://t.co/FGNcysiAnx
